commands.generate: rch exec -- cargo run -q -p fnx-durability --bin fnx-durability -- generate artifacts/phase2c/FNX-P2C-009/parity_report.json artifacts/phase2c/FNX-P2C-009/parity_report.raptorq.json fnx-p2c-009-parity-report phase2c_parity_report 1400 6
commands.scrub: rch exec -- cargo run -q -p fnx-durability --bin fnx-durability -- scrub artifacts/phase2c/FNX-P2C-009/parity_report.json artifacts/phase2c/FNX-P2C-009/parity_report.raptorq.json
commands.decode_drill: rch exec -- cargo run -q -p fnx-durability --bin fnx-durability -- decode-drill artifacts/phase2c/FNX-P2C-009/parity_report.raptorq.json artifacts/phase2c/FNX-P2C-009/parity_report.recovered.json
